00025 // positive parity
00026 Constraint ConstraintParityP = {
00027   val : 0.0,
00028   label : "ParP",
00029   me : calcConstraintParP,
00030   gradme : calcgradConstraintParP,
00031   output : outputConstraintZero
00032 };

00080 // workspace
00081 static SlaterDet SQ;
00082 static SlaterDet SdagQ;
00083 static gradSlaterDet dN;
00084 static gradSlaterDet dS;
00085 static gradSlaterDet dSdag;
00086 
00087 static void initworkspace(const SlaterDet* Q)
00088 {
00089   initSlaterDet(Q, &SQ);
00090   initSlaterDet(Q, &SdagQ);
00091 
00092   initgradSlaterDet(Q, &dN);
00093   initgradSlaterDet(Q, &dS);
00094   initgradSlaterDet(Q, &dSdag);  
00095 }                    
00096 
00097 
00098 // parity operation is hermitian
00099 
00100 // constraint on positive parity
00101 void calcConstraintParP(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00102                         double* parpconstraint)
00103 {
00104   if (SQ.A == 0)
00105     initworkspace(Q);
00106     
00107   copySlaterDet(Q, &SQ);
00108   // parity operation
00109   invertSlaterDet(&SQ);
00110 
00111   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Q, X);
00112   double N = X->ovlap;
00113 
00114   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, &SQ, X);
00115   double S = X->ovlap;
00116 
00117   *parpconstraint = S/N-1.0;
00118 }
00119 
00120 void calcgradConstraintParP(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00121                            const gradSlaterDetAux* dX,
00122                            gradSlaterDet* dparpconstraint)
00123 {
00124   if (SQ.A == 0)
00125     initworkspace(Q);
00126 
00127   copySlaterDet(Q, &SQ);
00128   // parity operation
00129   invertSlaterDet(&SQ);
00130 
00131   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Q, X);
00132   double N = X->ovlap;
00133   calcgradSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Q, X, dX);
00134   calcgradOvlapod(Q, Q, X, dX, &dN);
00135 
00136   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, &SQ, X);
00137   double S = X->ovlap;
00138   calcgradSlaterDetAuxod(Q, &SQ, X, dX);
00139   calcgradOvlapod(Q, &SQ, X, dX, &dS);
00140 
00141   addmulttogradSlaterDet(dparpconstraint, &dS, 1.0/N);
00142   addmulttogradSlaterDet(dparpconstraint, &dN, -S/(N*N));
00143   dparpconstraint->val = S/N - 1.0;
00144 
00145 }

00148 // constraint on negative parity
00149 void calcConstraintParN(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00150                         double* parnconstraint)
00151 {
00152   if (SQ.A == 0)
00153     initworkspace(Q);
00154     
00155   copySlaterDet(Q, &SQ);
00156   // parity operation
00157   invertSlaterDet(&SQ);
00158 
00159   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Q, X);
00160   double N = X->ovlap;
00161 
00162   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, &SQ, X);
00163   double S = X->ovlap;
00164 
00165   *parnconstraint = S/N + 1.0;
00166 }
00167 
00168 void calcgradConstraintParN(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00169                            const gradSlaterDetAux* dX,
00170                            gradSlaterDet* dparnconstraint)
00171 {

00173     initworkspace(Q);

00176   // parity operation
00177   invertSlaterDet(&SQ);
00178

00180   double N = X->ovlap;
00181   calcgradSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Q, X, dX);

00187   calcgradOvlapod(Q, &SQ, X, dX, &dS);
00188 
00189   addmulttogradSlaterDet(dparnconstraint, &dS, 1.0/N);
00190   addmulttogradSlaterDet(dparnconstraint, &dN, -S/(N*N));
00191   dparnconstraint->val = S/N + 1.0;
00192

00196 // rotate by pi in isospin space
00197 static void RisoppiSlaterDet(SlaterDet* Q)
00198 {
00199   assert(Q->Z == Q->N);
00200   
00201   int i;
00202   for (i=0; i<Q->ngauss; i++) {
00203     if (Q->G[i].xi == +1) {
00204       Q->G[i].xi = -1;
00205     } else {
00206       Q->G[i].xi = +1;
00207       Q->G[i].chi[0] *= -1.0;
00208       Q->G[i].chi[1] *= -1.0;
00209     }
00210   }
00211 }
00212 
00213 // rotate by -pi in isospin space
00214 static void RisompiSlaterDet(SlaterDet* Q)
00215 {
00216   assert(Q->Z == Q->N);
00217   
00218   int i;
00219   for (i=0; i<Q->ngauss; i++) {
00220     if (Q->G[i].xi == -1) {
00221       Q->G[i].xi = +1;
00222     } else {
00223       Q->G[i].xi = -1;
00224       Q->G[i].chi[0] *= -1.0;
00225       Q->G[i].chi[1] *= -1.0;
00226     }
00227   }
00228 }

00230 
00231 // constraint on symmetry under parity and charge
00232 void calcConstraintParCh(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00233                          double* parchconstraint)
00234 {
00235   if (SQ.A == 0)
00236     initworkspace(Q);
00237 
00238   copySlaterDet(Q, &SQ);
00239   // parity and charge
00240   invertSlaterDet(&SQ);
00241   RisoppiSlaterDet(&SQ);
00242 
00243   copySlaterDet(Q, &SdagQ);
00244   // parity and charge
00245   invertSlaterDet(&SdagQ);
00246   RisompiSlaterDet(&SdagQ);
00247   
00248   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Q, X);
00249   double N = X->ovlap;
00250 
00251   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, &SQ, X);
00252   complex double S = X->ovlap;
00253 
00254   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, &SdagQ, X);
00255   complex double Sdag = X->ovlap;
00256 
00257   *parchconstraint = (Sdag*S)/(N*N) - 1.0;
00258 }
00259 
00260 
00261 void calcgradConstraintParCh(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00262                              const gradSlaterDetAux* dX,
00263                              gradSlaterDet* dparchconstraint)
00264 {
00265   if (SQ.A == 0)
00266     initworkspace(Q);
00267 
00268   copySlaterDet(Q, &SQ);
00269   // parity and charge
00270   invertSlaterDet(&SQ);
00271   RisoppiSlaterDet(&SQ);
00272 
00273   copySlaterDet(Q, &SdagQ);
00274   // parity and charge
00275   invertSlaterDet(&SdagQ);
00276   RisompiSlaterDet(&SdagQ);
00277 
00278   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Q, X);
00279   double N = X->ovlap;
00280   calcgradSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Q, X, dX);
00281   calcgradOvlapod(Q, Q, X, dX, &dN);
00282 
00283   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, &SQ, X);
00284   complex double S = X->ovlap;
00285   calcgradSlaterDetAuxod(Q, &SQ, X, dX);
00286   calcgradOvlapod(Q, &SQ, X, dX, &dS);
00287 
00288   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, &SdagQ, X);
00289   complex double Sdag = X->ovlap;
00290   calcgradSlaterDetAuxod(Q, &SdagQ, X, dX);
00291   calcgradOvlapod(Q, &SdagQ, X, dX, &dSdag);
00292 
00293   addmulttogradSlaterDet(dparchconstraint, &dSdag, S/(N*N));
00294   addmulttogradSlaterDet(dparchconstraint, &dS, Sdag/(N*N));
00295   addmulttogradSlaterDet(dparchconstraint, &dN, -2*Sdag*S/(N*N*N));
00296   dparchconstraint->val = Sdag*S/(N*N) - 1.0;
00297 }

00299 
00300 // constraint on rotation by 120deg around z-axis
00301 void calcConstraintD3H(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00302                        double* pard3hconstraint)
00303 {
00304   if (SQ.A == 0)
00305     initworkspace(Q);
00306     
00307   copySlaterDet(Q, &SQ);
00308   // rotation by 120deg
00309   rotateSlaterDet(&SQ, 0.0, 0.0, 2.0/3.0*M_PI);
00310 
00311   copySlaterDet(Q, &SdagQ);
00312   // rotation by -120deg
00313   rotateSlaterDet(&SdagQ, 0.0, 0.0, -2.0/3.0*M_PI);
00314 
00315   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Q, X);
00316   double N = X->ovlap;
00317 
00318   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, &SQ, X);
00319   complex double S = X->ovlap;
00320 
00321   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, &SdagQ, X);
00322   complex double Sdag = X->ovlap;
00323 
00324   // do not ignore phase
00325   // *pard3hconstraint = (Sdag/N - 1.0)*(S/N - 1.0);
00326 
00327   // ignore phase
00328   *pard3hconstraint = Sdag*S/(N*N) - 1.0;
00329 }
00330 
00331 void calcgradConstraintD3H(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00332                            const gradSlaterDetAux* dX,
00333                            gradSlaterDet* dd3hconstraint)
00334 {
00335   if (SQ.A == 0)
00336     initworkspace(Q);
00337 
00338   copySlaterDet(Q, &SQ);
00339   // rotation by 120deg
00340   rotateSlaterDet(&SQ, 0.0, 0.0, 2.0/3.0*M_PI);
00341 
00342   copySlaterDet(Q, &SdagQ);
00343   // rotation by -120deg
00344   rotateSlaterDet(&SdagQ, 0.0, 0.0, -2.0/3.0*M_PI);
00345 
00346   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Q, X);
00347   double N = X->ovlap;
00348   calcgradSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Q, X, dX);
00349   calcgradOvlapod(Q, Q, X, dX, &dN);
00350 
00351   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, &SQ, X);
00352   double S = X->ovlap;
00353   calcgradSlaterDetAuxod(Q, &SQ, X, dX);
00354   calcgradOvlapod(Q, &SQ, X, dX, &dS);
00355 
00356   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, &SdagQ, X);
00357   double Sdag = X->ovlap;
00358   calcgradSlaterDetAuxod(Q, &SdagQ, X, dX);
00359   calcgradOvlapod(Q, &SdagQ, X, dX, &dSdag);
00360 
00361   // ignore phase
00362   addmulttogradSlaterDet(dd3hconstraint, &dSdag, S/(N*N));
00363   addmulttogradSlaterDet(dd3hconstraint, &dS, Sdag/(N*N));
00364   addmulttogradSlaterDet(dd3hconstraint, &dN, -2*Sdag*S/(N*N*N));
00365   dd3hconstraint->val = Sdag*S/(N*N) - 1.0;
00366 }

00369 // constraint on reflection symmetry on xz-plane
00370 void calcConstraintSxz(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00371                        double* sxzconstraint)
00372 {
00373   if (SQ.A == 0)
00374     initworkspace(Q);
00375     
00376   copySlaterDet(Q, &SQ);
00377   // invert and rotate by 180deg around y-axis
00378   invertSlaterDet(&SQ);
00379   rotateSlaterDet(&SQ, 0.0, M_PI, 0.0);
00380 
00381   copySlaterDet(Q, &SdagQ);
00382   // invert and rotate by -180deg around y-axis
00383   rotateSlaterDet(&SdagQ, 0.0, -M_PI, 0.0);
00384   invertSlaterDet(&SdagQ);
00385 
00386   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Q, X);
00387   double N = X->ovlap;
00388 
00389   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, &SQ, X);
00390   complex double S = X->ovlap;
00391 
00392   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, &SdagQ, X);
00393   complex double Sdag = X->ovlap;
00394 
00395   *sxzconstraint = (Sdag*S)/(N*N) - 1.0;
00396 }
00397 
00398 void calcgradConstraintSxz(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00399                            const gradSlaterDetAux* dX,
00400                            gradSlaterDet* dsxzconstraint)
00401 {
00402   if (SQ.A == 0)
00403     initworkspace(Q);
00404 
00405   copySlaterDet(Q, &SQ);
00406   // invert and rotate by 180deg around y-axis
00407   invertSlaterDet(&SQ);
00408   rotateSlaterDet(&SQ, 0.0, M_PI, 0.0);
00409 
00410   copySlaterDet(Q, &SdagQ);
00411   // invert and rotate by -180deg around y-axis
00412   rotateSlaterDet(&SdagQ, 0.0, -M_PI, 0.0);
00413   invertSlaterDet(&SdagQ);
00414 
00415   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Q, X);
00416   double N = X->ovlap;
00417   calcgradSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Q, X, dX);
00418   calcgradOvlapod(Q, Q, X, dX, &dN);
00419 
00420   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, &SQ, X);
00421   complex double S = X->ovlap;
00422   calcgradSlaterDetAuxod(Q, &SQ, X, dX);
00423   calcgradOvlapod(Q, &SQ, X, dX, &dS);
00424 
00425   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, &SdagQ, X);
00426   complex double Sdag = X->ovlap;
00427   calcgradSlaterDetAuxod(Q, &SdagQ, X, dX);
00428   calcgradOvlapod(Q, &SdagQ, X, dX, &dSdag);
00429 
00430   addmulttogradSlaterDet(dsxzconstraint, &dSdag, S/(N*N));
00431   addmulttogradSlaterDet(dsxzconstraint, &dS, Sdag/(N*N));
00432   addmulttogradSlaterDet(dsxzconstraint, &dN, -(2*Sdag*S)/(N*N*N));
00433   dsxzconstraint->val = (Sdag*S)/(N*N) - 1.0;
00434 
00435 }

00438 // constraint on reflection symmetry on xz-plane
00439 void calcConstraintSyz(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00440                        double* syzconstraint)
00441 {
00442   if (SQ.A == 0)
00443     initworkspace(Q);
00444     
00445   copySlaterDet(Q, &SQ);
00446   // invert and rotate by 180deg around x-axis
00447   invertSlaterDet(&SQ);
00448   rotateSlaterDet(&SQ, 0.5*M_PI, M_PI, -0.5*M_PI);
00449 
00450   copySlaterDet(Q, &SdagQ);
00451   // invert and rotate by -180deg around x-axis
00452   rotateSlaterDet(&SdagQ, 0.5*M_PI, -M_PI, -0.5*M_PI);
00453   invertSlaterDet(&SdagQ);
00454 
00455   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Q, X);
00456   double N = X->ovlap;
00457 
00458   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, &SQ, X);
00459   complex double S = X->ovlap;
00460 
00461   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, &SdagQ, X);
00462   complex double Sdag = X->ovlap;
00463 
00464   *syzconstraint = (Sdag*S)/(N*N) - 1.0;
00465 }

00508 double outputConstraintZero(double val)
